p: With these four cases, the European Court will be asked to issue landmark decisions on climate justice. The Inter-American Court of Human Rights has already recognized the right to a healthy environment, including the ‘rights of nature’. The United Nations Human Rights Council similarly endorsed the right to a healthy environment in 2021, and established a Special Rapporteur for climate and human rights.9 Judgments from supra-national courts may well inspire domestic judges to fashion appropriate remedies for climate injustice.
